name: Sweepworld
description:
An old classic reimagined

In a new and exciting twist, the retro puzzle game comes to life! Navigate a compendium of challenging 3D levels while locating the hidden mines.

Step on a square to reveal it. If it contains a number, that's how many mines are among its 8 surrounding squares. Use these hints to work your way around the stage and pinpoint the positions of the mines. But watch your step — if you reveal a square that contains a mine... BOOM!

 Sweep the world!

There are over 60 diverse stages to explore across 4 colourful environments. The positions of the mines are randomised, so you'll have a different experience every time. Watch out for hazards too, such as ice, flamethrowers and electric barriers!

 Something for everyone

From eager newcomers to the occasional puzzlers to the seasoned veterans, everyone can enjoy the game by choosing their ideal difficulty level. You can work through the stages at a leisurely pace, or you can endeavour to set the fastest times!

 Unleash your power(up)!

What's a game without powerups!? Take advantage of handy powerups such as Super Jumps, Teleports and Jet Packs. Mastering them will be essential!

🎶  Featuring music by Antti Luode  🎶  Support the developer

Sweepworld may be free, but all support is dearly appreciated. If you enjoy it, please consider making a contribution via PayPal. Thank you!
